sentences.en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: By golly we can do something about it this time.
sentences.cn: 这次我们确实可以采取行动了。

sentences.en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
sentences.cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

sentences.en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentences.cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentences.en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
sentences.cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

sentences.en: I've slept in this here bed for forty years.
It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: McKay walked slowly toward this screen, feeling a growing tenseness.
sentences.cn: 麦凯缓缓地朝这个屏幕走来，每走一步心情都更加紧张。

sentences.en: She loved it, this was just up her street.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这个，这正中她的意。

sentences.en: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.cn: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.en: they stayed up chatting about this and that.
sentences.cn: 他们彻夜未眠，聊着各种事情。

sentences.en: They're freshly baked. I fetched them from the baker's this morning.
sentences.cn: 它们是刚出炉的。我早上去面包房买回来的。

sentences.en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
sentences.cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

sentences.en: This is more like a downpayment, or a deposit, if you like.
sentences.cn: 这更像是首付，也可以说是定金。

sentences.en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentences.cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentences.en: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.cn: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

phrases.phrase: this and that (或 this, that, and the other)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)各种事情；各样东西；各种活动
(非正式)我在这张床上睡了40年

trans.tran_cn: 这样地，就是这样，这么地
trans.tran_en: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

trans.tran_cn: 这，这个，这事，这人，这时，下面所说的事
trans.tran_en: used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has just been mentioned or to something that has just happened
